mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (admin_id, notice_name, notice_detail, notice_time) VALUES (#{adminId}, #{noticeName}, #{noticeDetail}, SYSDATE())
mapper.select: SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, admin_id AS adminId, notice_name AS noticeName, notice_detail AS noticeDetail, notice_time AS noticeTime FROM notice ORDER BY notice_time DESC

SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, admin_id AS adminId, notice_name AS noticeName, notice_detail AS noticeDetail, notice_time AS noticeTime FROM notice WHERE 1=1
AND notice_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
AND notice_detail LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
ORDER BY notice_time DESC
SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY notice_id DESC LIMIT 3
